title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 § 11.18 - Denial, Suspension, Conditioning and Revocation of Registration Statements and Applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 § 11.18 - Denial, Suspension, Conditioning and Revocation of Registration Statements and Applications

State Regulations
(a) The attorney general may by order, deny, suspend, condition, or revoke any
registration statement or application of any investment adviser, investment adviser representative, solicitor or principal made pursuant to GBL
§ 359-eee, in the public interest for good cause. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. &
Regs. Tit. 13
§
11.18

Adopted

New York State Register December 2, 2020/Volume
XLII, Issue 48, eff. 2/2/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
